    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        @Nonnull
Connection getConnection(long timeout,
                                  TimeUnit unit)
                           throws SQLException
        get a JDBC connection.
        Parameters:
        timeout - max time to wait.
        unit -
        Returns:
        null if unable to obtain connection in the provided time.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • from

        static DataSourceEx from(DataSource ds,
                         int maxNrConnections)
        Create a DataSourceEx from a plain vanilla DataSource. This DataDource will be guarded by a semaphore. THis is basically will allow you to not wait more than you want when the pool has no more connections to provide.
        Parameters:
        ds -
        maxNrConnections -
        Returns:

      • from

        static DataSourceEx from(DataSource ds,
                         Semaphore sem)
        Create a DataSourceEx from a plain vanilla DataSource. This DataDource will be guarded by the provided semaphore. Using s distributed semaphore can allow you to control nr of conns at a more global level.
        Parameters:
        maxNrConnections -
        Returns:
